tapestry.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a large piece of heavy cloth on which coloured threads are woven to produce a picture, pattern etc
tapestry.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a colourful tapestry depicting a hunting scene
tapestry.translation[0].definitions[1].d: something that is made up of many different people and things
tapestry.translation[0].definitions[1].e: This was all new to her – part of life’s rich tapestry.
